summary: A transformer‑based neural network implementing the Conditional DETR architecture for detecting and localizing objects in images. It encapsulates model configuration, forward computation, loss handling and inference utilities to produce class labels and bounding boxes.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate a state‑of‑the‑art object detection capability into applications such as autonomous vehicles, security surveillance, retail analytics, or any visual inspection system that requires accurate identification and localization of objects.
